ai-patthana21.43:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, namely, discussing the extent of the Teaching,
ai-patthana21.43:0.3_0: Seeing for what is called rejection of sights,
ai-patthana21.43:1.1_0: They don’t give rise to repulsion for form, and for the sake of surmounting forms. This is a cause of condition for the sake of repulsion.
ai-patthana21.43:1.1_1: ‘... for the sake of conditioned things.’ ...
ai-patthana21.43:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana21.43:2.1_0: Is not give rise to form, nor is conditioned by impingement, based on form, and with no cause or condition.
ai-patthana21.43:2.1_1: ‘... for the sake of conditioned things.’ ...
ai-patthana21.43:2.1_2: one person is building up one another while mutually saying:
ai-patthana21.43:2.1_3: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana21.43:3.1_0: Not for the sake of form, he doesn’t give rise to form in the formless, for the sake of untroubled, there is no cause or condition.
ai-patthana21.43:3.1_1: ‘This is the reason why foundation of one kind’ ...
